text: Mageina Tovah Begtrup (born July 26, 1979) is an American actress. She played Glynis Figliola in the TV series Joan of Arcadia (2003–2005) and Ursula Ditkovich in the final two movies of Sam Raimi's Spider-Man trilogy (2004–2007). Tovah was born in Honolulu, Hawaii. She grew up in Tennessee. She is Jewish. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Honolulu Category:Actors from Tennessee Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Jewish American actors
title: Mageina Tovah
